bio: Matthieu is a VP of Engineering at Theodo, in France, a company with more than 1000 top clients worldwide. He is very passionate about web development, Symphony and GatsbyJS. He loves open-source software, domain-driven design and TDD. On his spare time, he likes to play volley, piano and go to electronic festivals.
